Package ru.rsreu.kuznecovsokolov12.datalayer

Interface RoleDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OracleRoleDAO
    public interface RoleDAO
    The interface provides methods for working with user roles.

    This interface includes methods for retrieving the role of a specific user, getting a role by its name, and retrieving a list of all roles.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.List<Role> getAllRoles()
      Retrieves a list of all roles.
      Role getRoleByName​(java.lang.String name)
      Retrieves a role by its name.
      Role getUserRole​(User user)
      Retrieves the role of a specific user.

    • Method Detail

      • getUserRole

        Role getUserRole​(User user)
          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves the role of a specific user.
        Parameters:
        user - The user for whom to retrieve the role.
        Returns:
        The role of the specified user.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database error occurs.

      • getRoleByName

        Role getRoleByName​(java.lang.String name)
            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves a role by its name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the role to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The role with the specified name.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database error occurs.

      • getAllRoles

        java.util.List<Role> getAllRoles()
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves a list of all roles.
        Returns:
        A list of all roles.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database error occurs.
